titleStmt.title: A letter from Sr Matthew Hale, Kt. sometime Lord Chief Justice of England: to one of his sons, after his recovery from the small-pox
titleStmt.author: Hale, Matthew, Sir, 1609-1676.

publicationStmt.publisher: printed by J. Playford, for W. Shrowsbery, at the sign of the Bible in Duke-lane,

notesStmt.note: Running title: A letter from Sir M. Hale, to one of his sons.
Reproduction of original in the Columbia University Library.

place.placeName: the sign of the Bible in Duke-lane
